extensionDescription.message: 一個簡單的網站封鎖擴充功能。

blockSitesTitle.description: Title for the blocked sites list section.

inputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the input field.

blockedPageMessage.message: 你欲前往的網站已被「我不亂看(WereBlock)」擴充功能封鎖！
blockedPageMessage.description: Message displayed on the blocked page.

blockedPageUrlLabel.description: Label for the blocked URL on the blocked page.

goBackButton.description: Text for the go back button on the blocked page.

currentUrlLabel.description: Label for the current URL in the popup.

blockButtonText.description: Text for the button to block the current site.

unblockButtonText.description: Text for the button to unblock the current site.

siteBlockedStatus.description: Status message shown when the site is blocked.

siteNotBlockedStatus.description: Status message shown when the site is not blocked.

gettingUrlError.description: Error message when failing to get the current URL.

noBlockedSitesMessage.description: Message displayed when there are no blocked sites.
